metadata.synopsis: A local tries to buy "performance enhancing" medicine from a dragonborn nearby Sharess Caress. Dragonborn one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 9; 49;120- Talk to the dragonborn.

0.speaker: Surixana
0.text: As delightful as you are, I'll have to send you on your way - my customers need my undivided attention.

1.speaker: Surixana
1.text: If you are in need of some pleasurable assistance, might I direct you to Sharess' Carress? I only deal with referrals.
